import React from 'react'; const Main = () => { const handleEditAvatarClick = () => { const btn = document.querySelector('.user__avatar-editor-btn'); const popup = document.querySelector('.popup_id_new-avatar'); btn.addEventListener('click', () => { popup.classList.add('popup_visible'); }) } const HandleEditProfileClick = () => { const btn = document.querySelector('.user__nick-editor-btn'); const popup = document.querySelector('.popup_id_profile-edit'); btn.addEventListener('click', () => { popup.classList.add('popup_visible'); }) } const HandleAddPlaceClick = () => { const btn = document.querySelector('.user__add-post-btn'); const popup = document.querySelector('.popup_id_new-post'); btn.addEventListener('click', () => { popup.classList.add('popup_visible'); }) } return ( <>
